title: My Pixel 3 lost it's mother board this week, 13 months old. Any suggestions why?
content:
Pixel 3 died the other night while sitting on my coffee table, don't thin my battery was below 30% when it happened.

Google support said it would be a cheap fix at ubreakifix.

Lol, mother board gone, $350 to fix

Any ideas as to what would cause this, or how to figure that our?

Thing had just updated Android recently
